text: was a Japanese town in the Miyako District of Fukuoka Prefecture on the island of Kyushu.Japan-101, "Saigawa" ; Archived Saigawa website ; retrieved 2012-3-20. As of 2003, the town had an estimated population of 7,268 and a density of 74.16 persons per km². The total area was 98.00 km². On March 20, 2006 Saigawa was merged with the towns of Katsuyama and Toyotsu. Each became part of the new town of Miyako. ==References== ==Other websites== *Miyako website Category:Towns in Fukuoka Prefecture
title: Saigawa, Fukuoka
